Description: Bronze group of wrestlers, perhaps allegorical of Ptolemy overcoming his enemies.
Curator's comments: Roman Imperial Period, but perhaps base on a Hellenistic group.
Bibliographic references: Bronze / Catalogue of the Bronzes in the British Museum. Greek, Roman & Etruscan. (853)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1980 5 Jun- 26 Oct, London, BM, The Ancient Olympic Games
Associated names: Representation of: Ptolemy III Euergetes I (?)
